title: Benchmark Client KPIs
description: An agent must compare a client's Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) against industry benchmarks.

tasks.description: Load the client's KPI data and a separate file with industry benchmark data.
For each KPI, calculate the variance between the client's performance and the industry benchmark.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the percentage difference for each KPI.

tasks.description: Generate a table highlighting the KPIs where the client is underperforming the most.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a sorted table that clearly shows the biggest performance gaps.
